# Summary

tfinal.tpeak is given by the default rule - the last case in ph2 in vaccine arm - applied to D31_7. 



```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}

show.q=F

for (COR in c("D31nextgen_mock", "D31nextgen_mock_tcell")) {
    
  pathCoRoutput <- paste0("cor_coxph/output/", attr(config,"config"), "/", COR)
  
  config.cor <- config::get(config = COR)
  for(opt in names(config.cor)) eval(parse(text = paste0(names(config.cor[opt])," <- config.cor[[opt]]")))
  
  # need to redefine covariates_adjusted based on COR
  covariates_adjusted = config.cor$covariates
  covariates_adjusted = sub("\\~\\.\\+","",covariates_adjusted)
  covariates_adjusted = sub("_","",covariates_adjusted)

  if (COR == "D31nextgen_mock") {
    assays1 = assays[startsWith(assays,"bind") | startsWith(assays,"pseud")]
    # hack
    assays1=assays1[!assays1 %in% c("bindSpike_IgG_N","bindSpike_IgA_N")]
  } else if (COR == "D31nextgen_mock_tcell") {
    assays1 = assays[startsWith(assays,"T")]
  }
  message(assays1)

  all.markers=paste0("Day", tpeak, assays1)
  if (do.fold.change.overB) all.markers=c(all.markers, paste0("Delta", tpeak, "overB", assays1))
  names(all.markers)=all.markers
  
  fname.suffix=""
  
  has.alt = F
  show.tertile.curves=T
  show.risk.curves = F
  show.ve.curves = F
  plot.geq=F

  # coef tables for linear and trichotomized
  level=1 # section title indent
  res = knitr::knit_child(c(here::here('cor_coxph', 'report_by_COR.Rmd')), quiet = TRUE)
  cat(res, sep = '\n')
```
